div.h2: HELPING ALL CHILDREN TO GROW INTO GREATNESS

div.p:
GOOOOOOOOOOOD MORNING, MUSTANGS.....These are your (virtual) Friday morning announcements (from your principal(s))! Enjoy
￼
<3
BES: https://youtu.be/dbDnDrXs_Hw
BMS: https://youtu.be/VcwqN87jgV8

Brookwood Families, we are SO excited to introduce you all to Andrew Jandron who is a student-teacher intern working with Mrs. Obry and Mrs. Fitzsimmons for the rest of this school year! Jandron is currently attending Capella University and is working on completing his degree in School Counseling. He will be graduating this June to continue his career in education. Jandron's background has a strong passion for working with different focus groups directly related to mental health such as behavioral groups and anxiety/depression groups. His driving passion is being able to work with kids of all backgrounds and experiences. Jandron is not only invested in working with students in the classroom setting but also on the basketball court and on the track field. Jandron's experiences have spanned from upper elementary to high school and he looks forward to expanding his skill set to an even broader range. During his free time, he enjoys reading, playing games, and learning new hobbies.
Mustangs, comment below and let’s give him a big Brookwood Family welcoming! #BrookwoodsBest

The Middle School Related Arts Team is putting together a weekly news special called Brookwood's Best News(BBN). The production will include highlights from our classes during this period of closure. Our students are THE BEST and we are excited to share their fantastic achievements. This is our first attempt. Enjoy! #BrookwoodsBest
